name: CHAdeMO Association
membership: CHAdeMO Association is a member of AVERE France
memberOrga: CHAdeMO Association member list can be viewed from here: https://www.chademo.com/pdf/memberlist.pdf
goal:
CHAdeMo Association develops and promotes CHAdeMO DC fast charging protocol. Our mission is “creating the optimal fast charging standard compatible with all EVs and deploying the infrastructure in order to accelerate the realisation of e-mobility globally.”

Established in March 2010, the Association has over 360 organisations across 36 countries, including automakers, utilities, charger makers, supporting businesses, and municipalities.

Our goals under the Transparency Register are (1) To establish CHAdeMO Protocol to be widely disseminated as an EN standard technology for DC fast chargers; (2) To promote multi-standard fast charger installation to improve electric vehicle users’ convenience; (3) To disseminate best practices and emerging learning from early-mover EV fast charging projects in order to accelerate EV adoption in Europe
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Energy policy: 2014/94/EU and other initiatives around electromobility, including smart grids task force, 2030 Energy and climate framework
